elements.text: You are waiting for your order at a bakery. As you walk over to pick up your baked goods, you fear you might clumsily drop them in front of everyone. You remind yourself that the to-go bag includes handles, so you will likely keep the bag...

elements.name: Getting Baked Goods_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
